content:encoded:
This week’s Case Closed opens with Four Rings Of Death, the February 25, 1945, episode of Nick Carter, Master Detective.

(30:36) Our second story is Agnes Bolton, from Pat Novak For Hire. This episode was originally aired June 5, 1949.

Download CaseClosed753

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more info. Thank you again to all who’ve helped out over the years!
